content: 1st ch1-space picot skip next treble_crochet work treble_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 3 times skip next treble_crochet treble_crochet in next ch1-space skip last treble_crochet ch1-space treble_crochet of stitch group ch5 dtri-in-dtri ch5 feather- with-picot-over-feather ch5 dtri-in-dtri ch5 through last dtri skip 1st treble_crochet 1st ch1-space 2nd treble_crochet of end group work treble_crochet in next ch1-space ch1 skip treble_crochet 3 times treble_crochet in next ch1-space picot skip treble_crochet then work treble_crochet ch1 3 times treble_crochet around tch 8tr at ends treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 10 of 13 top edging continuing with same hook and not cutting yarn ch1 and work a row of single_crochet along the top edge i worked 332 single_crochet ch1 turn and work a 2nd row of single_crochet back to start of previous row finish off and cut yarn this has got to be an all-time record of trebles for me how about you treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 11 of 13 double fantasy perhaps you prefer doubles to trebles if so you can make the shawl using double_crochet stitches instead anywhere you see a treble_crochet in the pattern substitute a double_crochet the starting chain for some row will be shortened by 1 chain your big-fans will have a single_crochet at the center instead of a half_double_crochet since double_crochet row are shorter than treble_crochet row you may want less center increasing you can work 2 additional non-increasing row in each repeat if desired and a few other minor changes see below for specifics section 1 nested double fans fan = 5dc instead of 5tr big-fan = 3dc 1sc 3dc all worked in same place increase-over-big-fan = skip 1st double_crochet single_crochet in 2nd double_crochet skip 3rd double_crochet fan in single_crochet skip 4th double_crochet single_crochet in 5th double_crochet skip 6th double_crochet ch15 or a multiple of 12 + 3 fan in 5th chain from hook… to start row 1 each row starts with ch5 turn fan in 5th chain from hook… before starting a row 7 to increase at the center you can add 2 more normal row work row 6 twice more if you want to slow the center increasing treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 12 of 13 section 2 triangle row alternating with fan row dtri = double triangle = double_crochet ch2 double_crochet worked in same st fan-in-dt = work a fan in ch2-space at center of dt between the doubles dtri-over-big-fan = skip 1st double_crochet single_crochet in 2nd double_crochet ch2 skip 3rd double_crochet dt in single_crochet ch2 skip 4th double_crochet single_crochet in 5th double_crochet ch2 skip 6th double_crochet wherever the directions specify a treble_crochet instead do a double_crochet keep the row starts as they are with the ch6 at the start before starting a row 2 to increase at the center you can add 2 more normal row a row 4 then a row 1 if you want to slow the center increasing keep in mind that this changes your next increase row to
